name: Sky Blast
description:
Pilot your rocket through several unique planet filled with challenging obstacles! The objective is simple -- fly from one pad to another! Pretty simple right?

The mission is to navigate your rocket to the landing pad while avoiding different obstacles. Collect coins along the way to purchase perks and upgrade your rocket to increase your chances of a successful launch! Are you up for the challenge?

Features
- Easy to use, difficult to master mechanics

- 30 unique levels across 3 different planets but more to come!

- Classic lander gameplay with a modern look

- Test your piloting skills from easy to hard low gravity environment

- 3 unique rockets with more on the way!

- Try the game for free (ad supported). Don't forget to leave a comment!
